title: Ticket #7298: Python 3 bindings are never built if Python 2 is not found
description: Currently in the Python bindings cmake script, building for Python 3 is nested under a check for the existence of Python 2 libraries. The result is that the bindings are not built on systems that only contain Python 3. We should enter the block for building the Python bindings if either Python 2 or 3 libraries exist.
